verses.verse: Ho <WH1945> Ariel <WH740>, Ariel <WH740>, the city <WH7151> where David <WH1732> encamped <WH2583>! add <WH5595> ye year <WH8141> to year <WH8141>; let the feasts <WH2282> come round <WH5362>:
then will I distress <WH6693> Ariel <WH740>, and there shall be mourning <WH8386> and lamentation <WH592>; and she shall be unto me as Ariel <WH740>.
And I will encamp <WH2583> against thee round about <WH1754>, and will lay siege <WH6696> against thee with posted troops <WH4674>, and I will raise <WH6965> siege works against thee <WH4694>.

And thou shalt be brought down <WH8213>, and shalt speak <WH1696> out of the ground <WH776>, and thy speech <WH565> shall be low <WH7817> out of the dust <WH6083>; and thy voice <WH6963> shall be as of one that hath a familiar spirit <WH178>, out of the ground <WH776>, and thy speech <WH565> shall whisper <WH6850> out of the dust <WH6083>.

But the multitude <WH1995> of thy foes <WH2114> shall be like small <WH1851> dust <WH80>, and the multitude <WH1995> of the terrible ones <WH6184> as chaff <WH4671> that passeth away <WH5674>: yea <WH6621>, it shall be in an instant suddenly <WH6597>.

She shall be visited <WH6485> of Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> with thunder <WH7482>, and with earthquake <WH7494>, and great <WH1419> noise <WH6963>, with whirlwind <WH5492> and tempest <WH5591>, and the flame <WH3851> of a devouring <WH398> fire <WH784>.

And the multitude <WH1995> of all the nations <WH1471> that fight <WH6633> against Ariel <WH740>, even all that fight <WH6638> against her and her stronghold <WH4685>, and that distress <WH6693> her <WH2472>, shall be as a dream, a vision <WH2377> of the night <WH3915>.

And it shall be as when a hungry <WH7457> man dreameth <WH2492>, and <WH398>, behold, he eateth; but he awaketh <WH6974>, and his soul <WH5315> is empty <WH7386>: or as when <WH834> a thirsty man <WH6771> dreameth <WH2492>, and <WH8354>, behold, he drinketh; but he awaketh <WH6974>, and <WH5889>, behold, he is faint, and his soul <WH5315> hath appetite <WH8264>: so shall the multitude <WH1995> of all the nations <WH1471> be <WH6633>, that fight against mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726>.

Tarry <WH4102> ye and wonder <WH8539>; take your pleasure <WH8173> and be blind <WH8173>: they are drunken <WH7937>, but not with wine <WH3196>; they stagger <WH5128>, but not with strong drink <WH7941>.

For Jehovah <WH3068> hath poured out <WH5258> upon you the spirit <WH7307> of deep sleep <WH8639>, and hath closed <WH6105> your eyes <WH5869>, the prophets <WH5030>; and your heads <WH7218>, the seers <WH2374>, hath he covered <WH3680>.

And all vision <WH2380> is become unto you as the words <WH1697> of a book <WH5612> that is sealed <WH2856>, which men deliver <WH5414> to one that is learned <WH3045>, saying <WH559>, Read <WH7121> this <WH559>, I pray thee; and he saith, I cannot <WH3201>, for it is sealed <WH2856>:
and the book <WH5612> is delivered <WH5414> to him that is not learned <WH3045>, saying <WH559>, Read <WH7121> this <WH559>, I pray thee; and he saith, I am not learned <WH3045>.

And the Lord <WH136> said <WH559>, Forasmuch <WH3282> as this people <WH5971> draw nigh <WH5066> unto me <WH6310>, and with their mouth and with their lips <WH8193> to honor <WH3513> me <WH7368>, but have removed their heart <WH3820> far <WH7368> from me <WH3374>, and their fear of me is a commandment <WH3925> of men <WH582> which hath been taught them <WH3925>;

therefore <WH3254>, behold, I will proceed to do a marvellous work <WH6381> among this people <WH5971>, even a marvellous work <WH6381> and a wonder <WH6382>; and the wisdom <WH2451> of their wise <WH2450> men shall perish <WH6>, and the understanding <WH998> of their prudent <WH995> men shall be hid <WH5641>.

Woe <WH1945> unto them that hide <WH5641> deep <WH6009> their counsel <WH6098> from Jehovah <WH3068>, and whose works <WH4639> are in the dark <WH4285>, and that say <WH559>, Who seeth <WH7200> us <WH3045>? and who knoweth us?

Ye turn things upside down <WH2017>! Shall the potter <WH3335> be esteemed <WH2803> as clay <WH2563>; that the thing made <WH6213> should say <WH559> of him that made <WH6213> it <WH6213>, He made me not <WH3336>; or the thing formed say <WH559> of him that formed <WH3335> it <WH995>, He hath no understanding?

Is it not yet a very <WH4213> little while <WH4592>, and Lebanon <WH3844> shall be turned <WH7725> into a fruitful field <WH3759>, and the fruitful field <WH3759> shall be esteemed <WH2803> as a forest <WH3293>?

And in that day <WH3117> shall the deaf <WH2795> hear <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of the book <WH5612>, and the eyes <WH5869> of the blind <WH5787> shall see <WH7200> out of obscurity <WH652> and out of darkness <WH2822>.
The meek <WH6035> also shall increase <WH3254> their joy <WH8057> in Jehovah <WH3068>, and the poor <WH34> among men <WH120> shall rejoice <WH1523> in the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478>.
For the terrible one <WH6184> is brought to nought <WH656>, and the scoffer <WH3887> ceaseth <WH3615>, and all they that watch <WH8245> for iniquity <WH205> are cut off <WH3772>;

that make a man <WH120> an offender <WH2398> in his cause <WH1697>, and lay a snare <WH6983> for him that reproveth <WH3198> in the gate <WH8179>, and turn aside <WH5186> the just <WH6662> with a thing of nought <WH8414>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, who redeemed <WH6299> Abraham <WH85>, concerning the house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290>: Jacob <WH3290> shall not now be ashamed <WH954>, neither shall his face <WH6440> now wax pale <WH2357>.

But when he seeth <WH7200> his children <WH3206>, the work <WH4639> of my hands <WH3027>, in the midst <WH7130> of him <WH6942>, they shall sanctify my name <WH8034>; yea <WH6942>, they shall sanctify the Holy One <WH6918> of Jacob <WH3290>, and shall stand in awe <WH6206> of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>.
They also that err <WH8582> in spirit <WH7307> shall come <WH3045> to understanding <WH998>, and they that murmur <WH7279> shall receive <WH3925> instruction <WH3948>.
